name: Faster Blaster Asteroid Master
description:
Our take on a classic game. 

Collect power ups to increase how many bullets you can fire. If you take damage, you'll lose them all and need to build back up. Take damage with no upgrades and your ship explodes! 

Survive as long as you can, get the highest score you can. 

Good luck!

=========================================
